Package src.model

Class Order

java.lang.Object
src.model.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Order extends Object implements Serializable
Order represents the room servce order made either by the customer/hotel personnel.

Each order contains an order Id, date and time, total bill, list of menu items ordered, special remarks, order status and room Id of the customer.

Since:
2022-03-31

    • addOrderItem

      public void addOrderItem(MenuItem menuItem, int amount)
      Adds a menu item and the specified quantity desired to be added to the current order. At the same time, this method adds the prices of the menu items added to the total bill.
      Parameters:
      menuItem - Menu item to be added to order
      amount - Number of menu item to be added to order

    • removeOrderItem

      public boolean removeOrderItem(MenuItem toBeRemoved, int amount)
      Removes a menu item and the specified quantity desired to be removed from the current order. At the same time, this method subtracts the prices of menu items removed from total bill.
      Parameters:
      toBeRemoved - Menu item to be removed from the order
      amount - Number of menu item to be removed from the oder
      Returns:
      true if removal is successful. Otherwise, false if removal failed (Amount entered to be removed is more than current amount in order)

    • printOrder

      public void printOrder()
      Prints the order of the customer

    • setRemarks

      public boolean setRemarks(String remarks)
      Sets remarks for the order
      Parameters:
      remarks - Remarks for the order
      Returns:
      true if sets successfully.

    • setTotalBill

      public boolean setTotalBill(double totalBill)
      Sets total bill of the order (used only by admin)
      Parameters:
      totalBill - total bill of the order
      Returns:
      true if sets successfully. Otherwise, false if the total bill is negative.

    • setStatus

      public boolean setStatus(OrderStatus currentStatus)
      Sets status of the order (used only by admin)
      Parameters:
      currentStatus - OrderStatus of the order
      Returns:
      true if sets successfully.

    • setRoomId

      public boolean setRoomId(String roomId)
      Sets room Id of the customer (used only by admin)
      Parameters:
      roomId - status of the room Id of the customer
      Returns:
      true if sets successfully.

    • findOrderItem

      public MenuItem findOrderItem(String name)
      Use the name of a menu item to check if the menu item is currently in the current orders
      Parameters:
      name - name of the menu item to find
      Returns:
      MenuItem object if the menu item is found. Otherwise, null.
